fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse a player each night.
- Ignite all doused targets at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targets that have been ignited will have their defence permanently increased by one stage. They may choose to remove their increased defence to make a powerful attack instead of their regular night action. The cause of death will show up as Arsonist (87).
- Targets will only know if they have been ignited.
- At any time, you may undo someone's ignition.
- You may target yourself.
